entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, introduced as he swims past a group of merpeople.

entities.name: merpeople
entities.description: A group of underwater creatures, described as watching Harry eagerly and pointing at his webbed hands and gills.

entities.name: grindylow
entities.description: A pet animal tied to a stake outside one door, mentioned as being watched by the merpeople.

entities.name: stone merperson
entities.description: A gigantic statue of a merperson hewn from a boulder, standing behind the choir of merpeople.

entities.name: champions
entities.description: The people being called toward the crowd of merpeople by the choir.

relationships.description: Harry is watched eagerly by a group of merpeople.
The merpeople own the pet grindylow tied to a stake outside one door.
The choir of merpeople is calling the champions toward them.
Four people are bound tightly to the tail of the stone merperson.
